data.name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Episode One
data.detailed_description:
The world of Dusklight is bleak yet filled with character. The last remaining capital city of a post-apocalyptic wasteland remains in the grips of a deceitful church and tyrannical corporations. New to this land, you’re to team up with a group of outlandish rebels to help topple the prevailing powers and free the people of the city. But everyone has a real agenda, and, as you’ll discover, trust is only temporary. As the protagonist, you’ll face your demons, fight your past and make choices that will change your world for good. All you’ve got to do is listen...

This is something new. Close your eyes, and explore. We don’t design games to be addictive, we design them to be unique.

Purple Jam uses Binaural Audio to construct AAA, highly polished environments, all of which are entirely navigable using only your ears. Binaural Audio implements HRTFs to accurately convey spatial audio information – positioning, distance, roll off, width, environmental reflections; the ways we as humans hear in real life have been captured, remapped and gamified. With fully fledged audio game mechanics like combat, narrative decisions that affect the world, sneak, dialogue interaction and more, Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Episode 1 changes how you think of gaming worlds, and it's about time we all tried something new.

Perfect for those with Visual Accessibility requirements, the first episode of the long-awaited series pushes gaming in a new direction, and gives you control in a whole new way.

Feature List

  • Audio Designed Menus
  • 10 Fully Designed, Voice Acted and Interactable Characters
  • Dynamic Mechanics (Stealth, Combat, and more)
  • 4 main areas to explore and interact with
  • Choice options for alternative ending
  • Reactive world and dialogue options
  • Composed music and sound design for AAA finish.
  • Fully strengthened narrative with professional Voice Acting
  • Host of world-based info and character-based info depending on choices made
  • Binaural Audio (HRTFs)
  • Save and Load system
  • Easy Joystick (mobile) and Arrow Key (PC) controls
  • Dynamic Terrain System

This product has minimal visual implementation. Visual aids are non-existent, and so any visuals you do encounter give you no advantage whatsoever. This is a true Audio Game with professionally recorded dialogue, sound effects and audio-system implementation. Headphones/Earphones are highly recommended to make use of spatial navigation, unique immersion qualities and to make the game a more playable experience.

data.short_description: Close your eyes and listen. Uncover. Choose. Fight. All within the dark and eccentric world of Pitch Black. The light will know.
